Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -1,11 +1,81 @@ -import React from 'react'; +import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' +import { Flex,Image,Text, Link } from '@chakra-ui/react' +import { Menu,MenuButton,MenuList,MenuItem,MenuItemOption,MenuGroup,MenuOptionGroup,MenuDivider,} from '@chakra-ui/react' +import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' +import {wurvicat} from "../assets/index" +import { CgDetailsMore } from "react-icons/cg"; +import { AiOutlineClose } from "react-icons/ai"; -type NavbarProps = { - \ No newline at end of file -}; -const Navbar:React.FC = () => { - - return
Have a good coding
+ +const Navbar = () => { + const [active,setactive]=useState("") + const[toggle,setToggle]=useState(false) +const location = useLocation(); + +// get the route of the page + useEffect(()=>{ +setactive(location.pathname) + },[location.pathname]) + + return ( + <> + + + {/* the logo of the brand wurvicat */} + + + + + {/* for a large device sucah a laptop,monitor and tabs */} + + HOME + ABOUT US + CLIENTS & PARTNERS + SERVICES + OUR PROJECTS + CONTACT + + + + {/* menu for a small device such as a phone */} + + + setToggle(!toggle)} + onClose={()=>setToggle(!toggle)} + > +{toggle ? : } + + + + HOME + ABOUT US + + CLIENTS & PARTNERS + SERVICES + OUR PROJECTS + CONTACT + + + + + + + + + ) } -export default Navbar; + +export default Navbar \ No newline at end of file

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -0,0 +1,80 @@
+import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react'
+import {  Flex,Image,Text, Link } from '@chakra-ui/react'
+import { Menu,MenuButton,MenuList,MenuItem,MenuItemOption,MenuGroup,MenuOptionGroup,MenuDivider,} from '@chakra-ui/react'
+import { CgDetailsMore } from "react-icons/cg";
+import { AiOutlineClose } from "react-icons/ai";
+import {useRouter} from "next/navigation"
+
+
+
+const Navbar = () => {
+    const [active,setactive]=useState("")
+    const[toggle,setToggle]=useState(false)
+    const router=useRouter()
+    console.log(router.)
+
+
+// get the route of the page 
+
+
+  return (
+    <>
+        <Flex  top={'6vh'}  justify={{base:"space-between",md:"space-around"}} align={"center"} height={{base:'15vh',md:"23vh"}}  >
+
+          {/* the logo of the brand wurvicat */}
+           <Flex ml={{base:"30px",md:"0px"}}>
+            <Image bg={"orange.500"} src={'/wurvicat.png'} width='75px' alt="Wurvicat"/>
+           </Flex>
+
+           {/* for a large device sucah a laptop,monitor and tabs */}
+            <Flex display={{base:"none",md:"flex"}} width={"55%"} justify="space-around" >
+                <Link href="/" color={active=='/' ? "orange.500" :"black"} _hover={{color:"orange.500",transition: '0.4s'}} >HOME</Link>
+                <Link href="/about" color={active=='/about' ? "orange.500" :"black"} _hover={{color:"orange.500",transition: '0.4s'}}>ABOUT US</Link>
+                <Link href="/clients-partners" color={active=='/clients-partners'? "orange.500" :"black"} _hover={{color:"orange.500",transition: '0.4s'}}>CLIENTS & PARTNERS</Link>
+                <Link href="/services" color={active=='/services' ? "orange.500" :"black"} _hover={{color:"orange.500",transition: '0.4s'}}>SERVICES</Link>
+                <Link href="/projects" color={active=='/projects' ? "orange.500" :"black"} _hover={{color:"orange.500",transition: '0.4s'}}>OUR PROJECTS</Link>
+                <Link href="/contact" color={active=='/contact' ? "orange.500" :"black"} _hover={{color:"orange.500",transition: '0.4s'}}>CONTACT</Link>
+              
+            </Flex>
+
+            {/* menu for a small device such as a phone */}
+            <Flex mr={{base:"30px",md:"0px"}} display={{base:"flex",md:"none"}}>
+              <Menu>
+  <MenuButton
+   px={4}
+    py={2}
+    bg={"transparent"}
+    transition='all 0.2s'
+    borderRadius='md'
+    border="none"
+    borderWidth='1px'
+    _hover={{ bg: 'transparent' }}
+    _expanded={{ bg: 'transparent' }}
+    _focus={{  bg: 'transparent', outline:"none" }}
+    fontSize={"40px"}
+    onClick={()=>setToggle(!toggle)}
+
+  >
+{toggle ?   <AiOutlineClose fontSize={'24px'}/> :  <CgDetailsMore  fontSize={'24px'}/> }
+  </MenuButton>
+  <MenuList>
+  <Flex flexDirection={'column'}>
+  <Link pl={"10px"} pb={"4px"} href="/" color={active=='/' ? "orange.500" :"black"} _hover={{color:"orange.500",transition: '0.4s'}} >HOME</Link>
+  <Link  pl={"10px"} pb={"4px"} href="/about" color={active=='/about' ? "orange.500" :"black"} _hover={{color:"orange.500",transition: '0.4s'}}>ABOUT US</Link>
+  
+  <Link pl={"10px"} pb={"4px"} href="/clients-partners" color={active=='/clients-partners'? "orange.500" :"black"} _hover={{color:"orange.500",transition: '0.4s'}}>CLIENTS & PARTNERS</Link>
+      <Link pl={"10px"} pb={"4px"} href="/services" color={active=='/services' ? "orange.500" :"black"} _hover={{color:"orange.500",transition: '0.4s'}}>SERVICES</Link>
+  <Link pl={"10px"} pb={"4px"} href="/projects" color={active=='/projects' ? "orange.500" :"black"} _hover={{color:"orange.500",transition: '0.4s'}}>OUR PROJECTS</Link>
+  <Link pl={"10px"} pb={"4px"} href="/contact" color={active=='/contact' ? "orange.500" :"black"} _hover={{color:"orange.500",transition: '0.4s'}}>CONTACT</Link>
+  
+
+  </Flex>
+  </MenuList>
+</Menu>
+            </Flex>
+        </Flex>
+    </>
+  )
+}
+
+export default Navbar
\ No newline at end of file

commits.name: Commit-0
